a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Public health expenditure includes: recurrent and capital spending (central and local levels), external borrowing and
grants (including donations from international agencies and NGOs), and social or compulsory insurance funds.
Source: Our World In Data based on Lindert (1994), OECD (1993), OECD.stat and WHO
